changes.description: Drop support for Python 3.6 and 3.7 as they are not maintained. Minimum supported version is Python 3.8.
Upgrade project third-party dependencies to latest version.
Add support for custom properties in changeset files.

Change deletion logic in `next-release` folder: only delete json files, and delete the folder only if empty. This will allow to keep the `next-release` folder if it contains other files such as `.gitkeep` for example.
Change json mapper to use granurality of seconds instead of milliseconds for `created_at` field in releases.
